column5: Is there a place one can find salmon without getting on a boat in GTA, especially in East York? Thanks!
Man if this questions works.  I be a total post tramp.  CAN SOMEONE TELL ME WHERE TO CATCH FISH  EVERY TIME I LAUNCH MY BOAT?
to the left of where you launch!
No, I would go to metro. BTW trolling works best on the water.
yet another new member who experienced a bad start to the forum... hope he/she will still lurk around
i would think that the sense of humour found in this thread is one of the positives of this forum!
Nice try editing your post MikeyMikey.  The only negative thing in this thread is your post.
When theyre spawning they ll go up most rivers running into Lake Ontario, the credit, the humber and rouge river to name a few.

I would try trolling in Sobeys/Metro or even Loblaws ...  On a serious note ... check out MNR's "Urban Fishing Opportunities" document ... in there it lists a bunch of spots where you can catch whatever fish. At this time of the year, find river mouths or lower stretches of those rivers.  Remember to let us know how you make out.
Here is the link to that Urban Fishing Opportunities  http://66.241.141.186/Website/TRCA/ParksAn...portunities.pdf  it's in PDF format
